review: Very nice for streaming Netflix, HBO Go, Youtube and other apps on any TV. Most smart TVs have limited apps and don't support HBO Go, so this is a cheap way to upgrade that ability. I don't know if it's Chromecast or the individual apps (I'm talking to you Netflix) but it continues streaming but your app won't show connection to the TV anymore, so you can't control the player. It's really annoying.
